Deploying a local server when some HTML restrictions exist.

In some cases, local HTML files has restrictions to be visualize using a web 
browser, a common solution is deploy a local server

Suppose for a moment that you are programming in javascripts using d3 library 
and you realize that for visualize your interactive graph a local server is 
needed. The objective of this post is not  reinvented the wheel, instead is a 
reminder for future personal proyects.


# Terminal with Python

I hope that you already have python installed and your operative system is Linux, 
if not please do it. 

Running a small Python server is definitely the quickest 
option.
